title: The Hunt Begins
description: The entire hidden magical world was in danger from an unknown foe after many years of safety. Bishop and the Pixies were the “ace in the hole” for the magical world… a most unexpected and improbable combat “team”.*NOTE TO For security purposes certain sensitive names, dates, and places in these stories have been redacted or altered. This threat is real and ongoing. Bishop
author: Nathaniel Parkinson
